solution_line_template: After keeping {kept_cards} cards, Rick had {total_cards} cards - {kept_cards} cards = {cards_left} cards left.

The total number of cards given by Rick to his {num_friends} friends was {num_friends} friends x {cards_per_friend} cards/friend = <<{num_friends}*{cards_per_friend}={cards_given_friends}>>{cards_given_friends} cards.
There were {num_sisters} sisters x {cards_per_sister} cards/sister = <<{num_sisters}*{cards_per_sister}={cards_given_sisters}>>{cards_given_sisters} cards given to Rick's sisters.

So, there were {cards_given_friends} cards + {cards_given_sisters} cards = <<{cards_given_friends}+{cards_given_sisters}={total_cards_given_others}>>{total_cards_given_others} cards left after Rick gave Miguel some cards.
Therefore, {cards_left} cards - {total_cards_given_others} cards = <<{cards_left}-{total_cards_given_others}={cards_given_miguel}>>{cards_given_miguel} cards were given to Miguel.
